list.abs: But this is not the case for the Western intelligentsia ., 但是在西方文化界 , 并不是这样.
the soviet communist party and the soviet intelligentsia ., 苏联共产党与苏联知识分子.
the Putin years have split the Russian intelligentsia .普京任内，俄罗斯知识阶层发生分裂。

she would have preferred a normal life ; but when war burst upon her , she responded with the compassion and resolve which were once the hallmarks of the Russian intelligentsia .她可能也更愿意选择一个正常的生活，但当战争突然出现在她面前的时候，她以同情和决心做出回答，这曾经是俄罗斯知识分子的标志。
The Soviet ' s toughing culture and intelligentsia policies refired Gorky inner controversy ., 然而 , 苏维埃政权不断强硬的文化和知识分子政策 , 再次激发了与高尔基的矛盾.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: from Russian intelligentsiya, from Polish inteligencja, from Latin intelligentia (see intelligence)

entry.tran: 知识分子;知识阶层;知识界
entry.def: The intelligentsia in a country or community are the most educated people there, especially those interested in the arts, philosophy, and politics.

example.ex: I was not high up enough in the intelligentsia to be invited to such exalted meetings.
example.tran: 我在知识界的资历还没有高到能受邀参加这种盛会。

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"病"; 2. 表名词,"总称,状态等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: hypo在……下面+chondr忧郁+ia病→在下面忧郁→忧郁症
ambros不死的+ia总称,状态等→n.神仙食品,美味
corn角+u+cop丰富+ia表示物→表示丰富的角→丰饶角
in内部+sign信号+ia总称,状态等→内部标志

stems_affixes.value_cn: 知识分子[集合称],知识阶层,知识界
stems_affixes.word_buile: intelligent聪明的,伶俐的+s+ia总称,状态等→n.知识分子[集合称],知识阶层,知识界
milit兵+ia总称,状态等→n.民兵[组织]
minute细小的+ia总称,状态等→n.微枝末节,细节

stems_affixes.value_cn: 乌托邦,理想的完美境界,空想的社会改良计划
stems_affixes.word_buile: utop没有的地方即no place+ia总称,状态等→乌托邦现实中是没有的
